experimentDetails.name: Initial Sampling Experiment
experimentDetails.description: Initial test run of geometric sampling for machine learning dataset preparation.

labels.description: Labels are not processed in this experiment.

normals.description: Normals computation is not required for this experiment.

target_sample_points.description: Target number of points to sample from each model.

point_distance.description: Minimum distance between points to be sampled. 0.1 is more dense (time consuming), 0.9 is less dense.

sample_type.description: Random sampling method selected for this experiment. Output will be downsampled to poisson disk sampling.

num_samples.description: Total number of samples to be generated across the dataset.

split_ratios.description: Proportions for dividing the dataset into training and validation sets.

paths.description: Directory paths where the output data for each dataset split should be stored.
